1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Utilities for term contents.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Utility
6  ( -- * Get & Put
7    CGetPut,
8    gpText, gpList, gpSet, gpSetSort,
9
10    -- * Utility
11    contAp, contMap,
12    contApTextToText,
13    contMapTextToList,
14    judgeContString,
15    contString,
16    mixBracketList,
17    mixBracketSet,
18  ) where
19
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                 as O
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                     as B
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                   as S
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type                as D
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class               as D
25
26
27-- ----------------------  Get & Put
28
29-- | Pair of get and put.
30type CGetPut a c = (c -> a, a -> c)
31
32-- | 'gText' and 'pText'.
33gpText :: (D.CText c) => CGetPut [Char] c
34gpText = (D.gText, D.pText)
35
36-- | 'gList' and 'pList'.
37gpList :: (D.CList c) => CGetPut [c] c
38gpList = (D.gList, D.pList)
39
40-- | 'gSet' and 'pSet'.
41gpSet :: (D.CSet c) => CGetPut [c] c
42gpSet = (D.gSet, D.pSet)
43
44-- | 'gSetSort' and 'pSet'.
45gpSetSort :: (Ord c, D.CSet c) => CGetPut [c] c
46gpSetSort = (D.gSetSort, D.pSet)
47
48
49-- ----------------------  Utility
50
51-- | Apply function to internal value of content.
52--
53--   >>> contAp gText pText reverse (pText "abc" :: BaalaC) :: BaalaC
54--   VText "cba"
55--
56contAp :: (a' -> a) -> (b -> b') -> (a -> b) -> a' -> b'
57contAp get put f = put . f . get
58
59-- | Map function to internal value of content.
60contMap :: (Functor f) => (a' -> f a) -> (f b -> b') -> (a -> b) -> a' -> b'
61contMap get put f = contAp get put $ fmap f
62
63contApTextToText :: (D.CText c) => O.Map String -> B.AbMap c
64contApTextToText = contAp D.gText D.putText
65
66contMapTextToList :: (D.CList c, D.CText c) => (Char -> c) -> B.AbMap c
67contMapTextToList = contMap D.gText D.putList
68
69-- | Convert term content to string value.
70judgeContString :: (D.CContent c) => D.Judge c -> D.Judge String
71judgeContString = (contString <$>)
72
73-- | Convert content to string value.
74--
75--   >>> contString (pText "a" :: BaalaC)
76--   "a"
77--
78contString :: (D.CContent c) => c -> String
79contString = B.mixToFlatString. contStringMix
80
81-- | Convert content to pretty print doc.
82contStringMix :: (D.CContent c) => c -> B.MixText
83contStringMix c
84    | D.isCode   c  = B.mixString $ D.gCode c
85    | D.isText   c  = B.mixString $ D.gText c
86    | D.isTerm   c  = B.mixString $ '/' : D.gTerm c
87    | D.isDec    c  = B.mixString $ D.encodeDecimalCompact $ D.gDec c
88    | D.isClock  c  = B.mixEncode $ D.gClock c
89    | D.isTime   c  = B.mixEncode $ D.gTime c
90    | D.isBool   c  = B.mixEncode $ D.gBool c
91    | D.isEmpty  c  = B.mixEmpty
92    | D.isEnd    c  = B.mixString "(/)"
93
94    | D.isList   c  = mixBracketList $ B.mixJoinBar $ map contStringMix $ D.gList c
95    | D.isSet    c  = mixBracketSet  $ B.mixJoinBar $ map contStringMix $ D.gSet c 
96    | D.isTie    c  = B.mixString "<tie>"
97    | D.isRel    c  = B.mixString "<rel>"
98    | D.isInterp c  = B.mixString "<interp>"
99    | D.isType   c  = B.mixString "<type>"
100    | otherwise     = B.mixString "<?>"
101
102-- | Enclose mix text in list brackets.
103--
104--   >>> mixBracketList $ B.mixString "a"
105--   MixText "[ a ]"
106--
107mixBracketList :: B.MixText -> B.MixText
108mixBracketList = B.mixBracketS S.listOpen S.listClose
109
110-- | Enclose mix text in set brackets.
111--
112--   >>> mixBracketSet $ B.mixString "a"
113--   MixText "{ a }"
114--
115mixBracketSet :: B.MixText -> B.MixText
116mixBracketSet = B.mixBracketS S.setOpen S.setClose
117
